comments: I have had Mrs. Wimmer (PW) for about half of my SOC classes. She is always helpful and so compassionate about every single student. She really cares about if you do well or not.
Excellent professor! Love her all four years at ferrum college

Peg is an awesome person outside of the classroom but very very confusing. She means well but does not explain the assignments to the point where the entire class is baffled. I\'d much rather have her for soc then dr. mead but they are both very very confusing!

Peg is an awesome teacher. She is very flexible and leanant. She offers a lot of extra credit and has a tutor in the arc for help. The main thing in her class is journals. Not only does she allow you to correct them and get a better grade but the ones that u didnt do, she will give u a chance to do at the end of the semester as full credit.
